scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Digital records series (dated 2005-2020; 6.32 GB; 17,984 digital files) consists of digital copies of Troy Lovett's bound volumes as well as research files, photographs, and scans of correspondence. The books compiled by Troy Lovett consist of transcripts of letters and journals along with annotations and contextual material. The material was organized by Troy Lovett and remains in the original order.
